Justice Hammer

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, any divine class
Benefit: If you roll a critical hit with an at-will divine attack power, the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.


Revision (11/30/2009)
Page 43: Justice Hammer. Change to work with At-will divine powers. Benefit: If you roll a critical hit with an at-will divine attack power, the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 381, page(s) 93.
